釒字的基本解释

釒
jīn
同“金”。用作偏旁。俗称“金字旁”。

釒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jīn］
汉字部首。通称“金字旁”。用“金”作部首的例字有：鈴、欽、鍬等。

Basic explanation of words
釒
jīn
Same as "gold". Used as a radical. Commonly known as "Golden Characters".
釒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jīn］
Chinese radicals. Commonly known as "Golden Characters". Examples of characters using "gold" as the radical are: bell, qin, shovels, etc.
